content: Silk is one of the rare Crafting Materials in Black Myth: Wukong, used to upgrade your armor and unlock entirely new armor sets. Despite the abundance of Armor and Gear sets in the game, Silk is a lot rarer and you will have to get through a decent chunk of the game to find more of it, or consistent supplies of it in the open world.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Silk.md', within the main section titled 'Silk'.
The content is as follows:
Silk is one of the rare Crafting Materials in Black Myth: Wukong, used to upgrade your armor and unlock entirely new armor sets. Despite the abundance of Armor and Gear sets in the game, Silk is a lot rarer and you will have to get through a decent chunk of the game to find more of it, or consistent supplies of it in the open world.
